Header.title: Process Surveys (U) Ltd
Header.paragraph: A privately held company founded as a local investment in the year 2018, and registered under the Companies act 2012 of the Republic of Uganda in the year 2017

About.paragraph: PROCESS SURVEYS (U) LTD consists of a well-experienced team of surveyors and a professional management team. Our team has the technical expertise, equipment and the technology to deliver the best solutions to our clients; and to our clientsâ€™ our company is known to be reliable, delivers projects on time and within an agreed budget, and adheres to the highest ethical industry standards.
Why: Our aim is to maintain the highest level of professional integrity, employing best practices to deliver services to our clients in a timely, economic and professional manner. complete every project to its finest standards within the agreed timeframe by both parties
Why2: In deliverance of our services, we also endeavor to give a prospective contribution to the surveying field in Uganda by investing in the latest technologies, and training our employees accordingly

Features.title: Surveying and land documentation
Features.text: Land Surveying encompasses the following activities, with surveyors involved in one or more of these

Features.title: Engineering Surveys
Features.text: We have been recognized by our clients for the quality of the work we do and are committed to delivering sustainable engineering and design

Features.title: Real Estate
Features.text: Process surveys (U) LTD is a dynamic organization staffed by driven professionals who are among the best in their various fields

Features.title: Customized Services
Features.text: Specialized property advisory and supervisory services uniquely blended with capacity, knowledge and a deep experience in working with government agencies in the use of public land
